projectGridLines.stationName: Viacom - D2C Subscriptions – ChatBots (WhatsApp and RCS)
projectGridLines.title: Off Deck Marketing and automation
projectGridLines.description:
As an intern at JioCinema, you will play a crucial role in enhancing our user engagement and acquisition strategies. You will work with leading vendors such as Google, Meta, and Karix to design and implement an automated communication journey (Chatbot) for JioCinema users, integrating advanced tools to improve user experience and retention. Additionally, you will engage with Google and other strategic partners to identify and leverage opportunities that drive user acquisition, including exploring innovative campaigns.

Skill set :- •             Ability to analyze data and come up with metrics that will help in data driven decision making

•             Microsoft PPT & Excel

•             Primary & Secondary Market research

•             Understanding of communication channels such as Whatsapp, SMS, & Google Rich Business Communication (RCS)

•             Basic knowledge of SVOD and product features of OTT industry.

Other soft :-Excellent problem-solving skills

•             Ownership

•             Excellent communication

•             Partnership management
